title: New Holland Agriculture Publicly Launches the Industry's First All-Electric Utility Tractor with Autonomous Features ... - PR Newswire
summary: New Holland Agriculture has introduced the T4 Electric Power, the first all-electric utility tractor with autonomous features, aimed at sustainable farming and improving operational efficiency. This tractor offers powerful, emission-free performance, addresses cost ownership challenges, and can be charged using various renewable energy sources. It features advanced technology for productivity and reduces noise pollution compared to diesel models, making it suitable for use in noise-sensitive areas. The tractor will debut at the 2023 Farm Progress Show and is set to become commercially available in early 2024.
green_innovation: TRUE: This innovation contributes to environmental sustainability by providing a zero-emission electric tractor, thus reducing greenhouse gas emissions and environmental impacts associated with traditional diesel-powered tractors.
business_innovation: TRUE: The introduction of the T4 Electric Power represents a new or improved product that significantly differs from New Holland's previous offerings and introduces autonomous features and advanced electric technology to the market.
green_product: TRUE: The T4 Electric Power is designed and manufactured to significantly reduce environmental impact through its all-electric operation and use of sustainable technologies throughout its lifecycle.
green_process: TRUE: The development and manufacturing processes of the T4 Electric Power involve methods that minimize environmental impacts, such as the use of renewable resources and energy-efficient technologies.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 333111 - Tractors, Farm, Manufacturing; 336120 - Truck, Utility, and Body Manufacturing; 333241 - Lawn and Garden Tractor and Home Lawn and Garden Equipment Manufacturing; 221118 - Other Electric Power Generation
greenwashing: FALSE: The innovation described does not appear to be greenwashing as it presents substantial environmental benefits that are backed by genuine technological advancements and commitments to sustainability.
